newsitem.title: INDIA: India 97 Q1 forex merchant turnover $41.77 bln - RBI.
newsitem.headline: India 97 Q1 forex merchant turnover $41.77 bln - RBI.

text.p: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) said on Tuesday market purchases of spot dollars towards merchant transactions were $4.225 billion, $4.03 billion and $5.145 billion during January, February and March 1997 respectively.
"The interbank purchases of spot dollars were $6.674 billion, $6.627 billion and $8.027 billion, respectively, during the same months," the RBI said in a statement.

It said market sales of spot dollars during these months were $4.044 billion, $3.805 billion and $4.250 billion on the merchant account and $6.702 billion, $7.159 billion and $9.116 billion on the interbank account.
"Total merchant turnover for the first quarter of 1997 aggregated $41.774 billion and interbank turnover worked out to $220.429 billion," the RBI said.
